content: Hi! I'm a visiting assistant professor of mathematics at St. Olaf College in Northfield, Minnesota - just one year out of my PhD. I've recently played through the Natural Number Game & seen Kevin Buzzard's talks about the future of mathematics. This is my first experience with computer proof verification and I'm very intrigued to continue and possibly see how I (and/or students I end up working with, but for a very long time probably just I) could contribute to this project!
Pick some mathematics you think is fun, see what's already in mathlib, and ask here for advice or warnings regarding whatever the obvious next step is! :-)
